rule.description: Yandex: IAM user has been added to a federation by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: IAM access key has been created by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: IAM api key has been created by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: IAM certificate has been created for a federation by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: IAM federation has been created by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: IAM key pair has been created for a service account by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: IAM service account has been created by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: IAM access key has been deleted by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: IAM api key has been deleted by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: IAM certificate for a federation has been deleted by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: IAM federation has been deleted by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: IAM key pair for a service account has been deleted by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: IAM secrets in the public domain has been deleted by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
Yandex: IAM service account has been deleted by - $(authentication.subject_name), remote_address - $(request_metadata.remote_address)
